pageContext.claim: “I am all alone (poor me) in the White House waiting for the Democrats to come back and make a deal on desperately needed Border Security. At some point the Democrats not wanting to make a deal will cost our Country more money than the Border Wall we are all talking about. Crazy!”
pageContext.analysis: This tweet contradicts the previous tweet, which suggested the wall would be built with "shutdown money." Now Trump appears to acknowledge the shutdown will be costly to the U.S. government.
